descriptionNullable:
This dataset is generated following the practice of Xiu (2020). The "up" folder in the data set represents the stock price increase in the next 5 days, and the "down" folder represents the future stock price decline. The data used to draw the image comes from the Chinese A-share market.
You need to divide the training and test sets yourself and train a machine learning model for this classification task. A very high portfolio Sharpe ratio is reported in the Xiu (2020) paper, and hopefully you will make a fortune from it.
title: Stock-OHLCV-Grayscale
subtitle: Stock Trend Prediction Task
description:
This dataset is generated following the practice of Xiu (2020). The "up" folder in the data set represents the stock price increase in the next 5 days, and the "down" folder represents the future stock price decline. The data used to draw the image comes from the Chinese A-share market.
You need to divide the training and test sets yourself and train a machine learning model for this classification task. A very high portfolio Sharpe ratio is reported in the Xiu (2020) paper, and hopefully you will make a fortune from it.
